options.responseText: No need to be shy now, you did *great*. I could feel it coming from a mile away. Honestly, I kinda love being covered in your cum...

options.optionText: Uh... wow, I didn’t expect that to happen...
options.responseText: Yeah, I get that a lot. What’s the matter? You look like you just got hit by a runaway brahmin. Never seen a pair in action before?

followUpOptions.optionText: I-I mean, is this like... a normal thing for you?
followUpOptions.responseText: Normal? Babe, nothing about this vault is normal. But when you’ve got these, you might as well put them to work, right?

followUpOptions.optionText: Are you sure you’re okay with... all this?
followUpOptions.responseText: *Diana bites her lip, glancing at the mess on her chest* Okay with it? Babe, I’m more than okay. Watching you explode like that got me *so* worked up... you have no idea. You’ve got one hell of a shot.

followUpOptions.optionText: I mean, you *do* look pretty hot covered in it...
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, I know I do. And I know you like it too. The way you were staring, I could tell you were loving every second of it. Don’t lie.

followUpOptions.optionText: I didn’t know you were into... this much of a mess.
followUpOptions.responseText: What can I say? It’s kinda hot knowing I drove you *that* crazy. Makes me wonder how much more you’ve got in that tank of yours.

followUpOptions.optionText: So... is this the part where I say thank you or...?
followUpOptions.responseText: I mean, if you’re into the whole ‘thanking’ thing, sure.

options.responseText: A towel? Honey, I need a *fire hose*. You didn’t just shoot a load, you triggered a fucking flood warning.

responseTexts: Later. Try not to pass out in the hallway thinking about this, alright? Wouldn’t want to explain that to the Purity Police.
